label: logicB:weather_en
steps: [1] If a strong onshore wind develops, then moist marine air moves inland.
[2] If moist marine air moves inland, then cloud cover thickens.
[3] For any site x, if a sea-breeze front reaches x, then x reports rising humidity.
[4] If cloud cover thickens and Harbor Point reports rising humidity, then rain is likely soon.
[6] A sea-breeze front reaches Harbor Point.
[7] Cloud cover thickens and Harbor Point reports rising humidity. (from [1â€“3], [5], [6])
[8] Therefore, rain is likely soon. (from [4] and [7])
